law.catch_line: Nonapplicability of chapter to legal gambling transactions.
law.text: The terms and provisions of this chapter do not apply to betting, gaming, or wagering that has been authorized, permitted, or legalized, including, but not limited to, all activities and transactions permitted under KRS Chapters 154A, 230, and 238.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 447, sec. 4, effective July 14, 2000.
